body.p:
All changes, new features etc. are summarized below. If your application is already near version 2015.07, you only have to update your pom.xml (using DocPortal, you find this file in docportal/config):
[...] <groupId>org.mycore</groupId> <artifactId>application-model</artifactId> <version>2015.07</version> [...] <dependency> <groupId>org.mycore</groupId> <artifactId>mycore-{component}</artifactId> <version>2015.07</version> <optional>false</optional> </dependency> [...]
In the next step you have to build your application again mvn clean install or in DocPortal ant resolve && create.jar create.scripts create.webapp.
